movie.title: Fast & Furious 6
movie.actors: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jordana Brewster
movie.plot: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets convoluted also facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.
movie.language: English, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Cantonese, Dutch
